message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a starting price of $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $16,000 for this product.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
Alice, I appreciate the compromise, but $18,000 is still a little too high for me. I'm firm on $16,000. This is my final offer, if we can't agree on this price, I'll have to go with another seller.
